name: DEAD ORBIT (itch) (jackfhodges)
description:
This is my 2D Platformer project for CAS 117.

Modifications

1. Created original soundtrack using FL Studio 20

2. Created 2 cohesive levels that end in a boss fight.

3. Redid main menu to be more visually appealing.

4. Modified the damage and health on most of the enemies as well as created a unique boss unit that has much more health and a unique style of movement.

Made by Jack Hodges
